title: shrI raghukula jaladhi
sahitya:
shrI raghukula jaladhi sucarita shrtajana pOSaNacaNa


anupallavi

  vIra dhIra sukumAra jaladhi gambhIrOdAra cArutara gAtra


caraNam    sumashara janakAbhaya pradAyaka campaka nAsika rucira kapOla 
surucira radana sOma nibha vadana kajnalOcana garuDa gamana
vimala budha tati kamanIya sadAshiva bhAgadEya surEya
vEda vinuta pAtra parama pavitra jaitra mitra kula pavitra
